Description:
Location:Abu Dhabi.
DubaiOverview:Data Collectors are responsible for conducting interviews with individuals. Their goal is to gather information about a particular subject, such as consumer opinions on a new product or service.Responsibilities:Interviewing participants about their opinions on a variety of topics.
Recording accurate responses using a device such as tablets.
Submitting data on time.Skills
Skills:
Experience: Minimum of 1 year experience in same field.
Language: Bilingual - Arabic and English.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Valid UAE residence visa.
